Articles.Content:
Does anyone else use the debug menu to sometime fulfill a contract?

I never give myself free money but so many times I have a huge mission and get a contract for same purpose a day later.. It happens all the time.

I was grinding temperature scans from Gilly. You can only do a temp scan up to 6 km, but quite of few contracts require you to do the scan above that range. I just flew into the area (to keep it legit) and force completed the contract. Had to do that like 5 times.
